pages.text: The $(item)Energion Aeroheater$() will be your main use of $(item)Energion Batteries$(). Up to 6 $(item)Energion Batteries$() can be inserted, all being used at the same rate.$(br2)It can reach a maximum temperature of 80, 100, 125, 160, 200 and 250 C with 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6 active $(item)Energion Batteries$(), respectively.
$(item)Energion Batteries$() can be inserted and empty $(item)Energion Batteries$() can be extracted from any side except the top.
